sense.name: The act that results in something coming to be.
sense.examples: The fashioning of pots and pans was a great innovation. It was already in the making. They set about the making of future plans.

sense.name: (always plural) Attributes that must be met as a precondition for something.
sense.examples: She has the makings of a fine musician. He has the makings of a teacher.

sense.name: (usually plural) the components needed for doing something.
sense.examples: The recipe listed all the makings for a cake. We don't have the makings for macaroni tonight.
